intro: Cherleria geniculata, commonly known as the zigzag plant, is a flowering plant belonging to the family Rubiaceae. It is characterized by its distinctive zigzagging stems that give it its common name. The plant produces small, white or pale yellow flowers arranged in clusters. Native to tropical regions of Africa, it thrives in moist, shaded environments. Its leaves are opposite, ovate, and often have a slightly serrated edge.
